resources.string:
Try your luck in the slot machine. 

Whats in store for you today? 

Place your bet and Ill get your prize. 

If value 3 matches, the standard number of points 

If 4 value, more points. 

If 5 value, more points. 

If one and two is a loss! 

Get prizes every day) 

We are waiting for you 

Choosing the difficulty of the game reduces the amount of the prize. 

Collect the same values to get a prize!

Start your day with a win. 

Good game gentleman!
